widget.name: Webinos Home Controller Gateway
widget.description: The Home Controller Gateway allows users to monitor, configure and manage in a very dynamic and customized way, sensors and actuators which the user has access to.The Home Controller Hub, taking full advantages of webinos platform, provides something more: users are not only able to read values from sensors or control actuators but also they can create logic rules using services provided by any of the user’s devices. Something like: “ If I’m close to my house (geolocation) then switch on lights (actuators)”
widget.author: Giuseppe La Torre - Daniela Ventura
